data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Haute-Saône, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Haute-Saône, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Haute-Saône, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 243,965 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Haute-Saône.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Haute-Saône.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Jew, Swiss-speaking people. Make the Jew, Swiss-speaking people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the county of Haute-Saône to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Haute-Saône, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Haute-Saône, Bourgogne-Franche-Comté, France.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,
